learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Vocabulary Acquisition and Use): Context Clues

p.b: Alfred Hitchcock, the famous director, made cameo appearances in 37 of his movies.

questionBody.p: Based on its role in the sentence, what can you tell about the word cameo?

simpleChoice.p: The word cameo is an adjective. It describes a kind of appearance.
The word cameo is a common noun. It names the thing that Hitchcock made.
The word cameo is a proper noun. It names a particular person.
The word cameo is a verb. It tells what Hitchcock did.
